sentences.sContent: She made a miraculous recovery from her injuries.
sentences.sCn: 她受伤后奇迹般地康复了。

sentences.sContent: They had a miraculous escape when their car plunged into a river.
sentences.sCn: 他们的车冲入河里，而他们却奇迹般地逃生了。

remMethod.val: mirac(奇迹) ＋ ul ＋ ous(…的) → 奇迹的

words.tran: 奇迹般地；神奇地；非凡地；出乎意料地
奇迹，奇迹般的人或物；惊人的事例

trans.tranOther: very good, completely unexpected, and often very lucky
